info.abstract: The Memory Student Learning Models performs enhanced AFM or PFA. In addition to the number of previous opportunities learners have, lag time is included in the model as a second linear component. The lag time is represented as Memory Strength: -d*log(LagTime) where d=-0.5
info.description: The Memory Student Learning Models performs enhanced AFM or PFA modeling. In addition to the number of previous opportunities learners had, lag time was included in the model as a second linear component. The lag time is represented as memory Strength: -d*log(LagTime) where d=-0.5
